song_lyrics: Mahantjīnī mūrti mārā manne bhāve re,
Manne bhāve re, mūrti sapane āve re;
Mahantjīnī mūrti mārā manne bhāve re... ṭek
Bhāl vishāḷ bhramar chhe sundar, ānkho pyārī re;
Karṇo komaḷ nāsā namaṇī, chibuk sārī re;
Gaur mukhe til-pankti joī, jāu vārī re,
Adhar anūp dant manohar, jan sukhkārī re;
Ang ang guru Mahantjīnu, mokṣhakārī re,
title: Mahantjīnī mūrti mārā manne bhāve re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1267: Sadhu Brahmavatsaldas

Category: Mahant Swami Maharajna Pad
